verbose_text: Here, we describe a profound loss of endoderm in ta/tbx16 double mutants and present findings demonstrating that Ta/Tbx16 directly regulate the cell-intrinsic endodermal regulator Mixl1, as well as extrinsic regulators of endoderm proliferation, the Cxcr4a ligands Cxcl12a/b.
evidence: ta/tbx16 double mutants and present findings demonstrating that Ta/Tbx16 directly regulate the cell-intrinsic endodermal regulator Mixl1              , as well as extrinsic regulators of endoderm proliferation, the Cxcr4a ligands Cxcl12a/b
